A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
List of why WE hated the Last Jedi

- All the plot holes
- All the ex machina moments
- The terrible disney jokes
- Useless product placement for porgs
- Casino scene that did nothing to story
- Superleia and logic behind that scene
- Wasting of Snoke and Phasma
- Fucking up Hux
- That idiotic bomber scene at the start
- The movie felt like a parody\, they literally took star wars and let mark hamil throw it over his shoulder. And had a "marvel" movie feel to it\, full of unnecessary jokes in situations that should be serious.
-  The director and writer decited to ignore half of what was set up in the force awakens. The knights of ren\, ray's parents\, plagueis' mystery\, etc.
- Plot\, The entire reason for why the Finn & Rose plot was happening was because miss purple hair didn't tell their crew that they had a plan. The only reason she did that was because the movie would have been over if she did\, I mean if that isn't bad writing I don't know what is.
- This was in the force awakens as well\, Ray being a "god" basically.
- have you heard the story of darth plagueis the wise? perhaps no\, cuz the director made it NONCANNON
